examples: I'm sorry I can't stop to chat.
Lo siento, no puedo parar a charlar.
My wife and his wife got chatting (= started chatting).
Mi esposa y su esposa empezaron a charlar (= empezaron a charlar).
My kids spend hours chatting on the phone to their friends.
Mis hijos pasan horas charlando por teléfono con sus amigos.
Within minutes of being introduced they were chatting away like old friends.
A los pocos minutos de ser presentados, estaban charlando como viejos amigos.
